## Test plan

- [ ] Unit tests pass (`pytest tests/ -k "not integration" -v`)
- [ ] Integration tests pass (`pytest tests/test_integration.py -v`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`ruff check deep_research_swarm/ tests/`)

## Checklist

- [ ] No secrets or API keys in committed files
- [ ] Types added to `contracts.py` if new data structures introduced
- [ ] Tests cover new functionality
